MineKhan

Play MineKhan online! This game is a free Minecraft clone developed on Khan Academy and later moved to my own website to take advantage of multiplayer servers. The front-end code is completely open source and maintained on GitHub, where contributions are welcome.

To share your world on KA, copy/paste the saveString
from this box into the code on line 190.
var loadString = "Your Code Here";
Then save the program as a Spin-off.
